com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces
Interface XhiveLinkReferenceIf

All Known Subinterfaces:
XhiveLocatorIf, XhiveSimpleLinkIf
public interface XhiveLinkReferenceIf

Represents an XLink reference. A link reference is defined by the XLink namespace attribute href.

Link classes XhiveSimpleLinkIf and XhiveLocatorIf extend this interface.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getHRef()
          Returns the value of the XLink attribute with name="href".
 java.util.Iterator getReferencedResources()
          Returns a java.util.Iterator with all resources identified by value of getHRef().
 

Method Detail

getHRef

Returns the value of the XLink attribute with name="href".

Returns:
The value of the XLink attribute with name="href".

getReferencedResources

java.util.Iterator getReferencedResources()
                                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                 org.xml.sax.SAXException
Returns a java.util.Iterator with all resources identified by value of getHRef(). The returned resources are objects of class XhiveLocationIf.

Returns:
A java.util.Iterator with all resources identified by value of getHRef().
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
